1.content:
Nevia Bren forced a smile on her face as she stepped into her office,her office was on the far end of the floor,a small space which housed a shelf of books,some clothes,some heels,her laptop and various pictures of public relation officers,Nevia sat on her desk and could only stare into the air,she had always known that Millicence was her mother,after twenty years of being away from her mother,she could still see the face of young Millicence telling her she would be back soon,that was the last time she saw the Millicence facially,she only heard about who Millicence had become but never had another chance to see her,she did not know if she was to cry or feel angry or happy,she suffered a lot after Millicence abandoned her and her siblings but she is fulfilled today doing what she knows how to do best,a knock on the door brought Nevia to the present,she sat up on her desk and asked her assistant,Bruce how she could be of help,
''a Devon Luciotan would like to see you''
This prompted Nevia to rearrange herself and take off her coat,she loved her visitors to be free and feel at home when around her......
Devon Luciotan walked into the small office,he looked around and could not believe why a person with a mother like Millicence would chose to stay in an office so small that it looked like a store,he smiled as he caught Nevia studying him
''good day,Miss Bren''he shook hands with her as he sat down,he looked into her eyes and could see innocence,he smiled calmly again,Nevia looked into his eyes and saw a person living a life of pains,.............

NEVIA
The sight of Devon Luciotan caught me unawares,he had a tanned skin,a smile that could sweep the world off its feet,his smile calmed me but i felt butterflies threatening to send me throwing up,i asked Devon the reason for his coming,his voice sounded deep and rich,he carried an atmosphere of power around him that made me want to do all that he wanted,but i knew better,
''i want to report a noise pollution around Main Saint,the trucks moving around makes it difficult for one to concentrate during the day talk more of in the night'',i was drawn to Devon ,there is something about him that makes me want to run and hide,i feared him but i could not send him out of my office on the basis of my emotions,i assured him that we would caution the truck drivers......

DEVON
I did not want to hurt her,i felt a need to protect her but my instructions were clear,life does not always give us what we want,it choses for us,i had to induce something and check for her reactions
''Millicence Andrews was murdered this morning'' her reaction shocked me

12.content:
''yes,I saw it on the papers today,it is surprising that a woman of such promising career would leave the world just as she was getting to the peak,she lost her husband just two days ago and then she also followed suit,how tragedic'' Nevia said
Devon smiled,it was surprising that she would take the death of her mother calmly,shows how strong she was...
Nevia could only stare at Devon,she felt the need to protect herself from him,there was something about him she could not place,he had a dangerous look around him yet a loving posture to calm the most worried soul,her heart raced rapidly,he just told her the one sentence that could topple her world,Devon gave her a painful smile
''she was my business partner,I did not expect her death so soon,it was unnerving,who would have wanted her dead,God,the world is brutal''
Nevia felt like reaching out to him to comfort him,her soul yearned to draw him to her bosom and make it all dissappear,
''I am sorry,I am very sure she was dear to you,she never striked me as a woman who would hurt a person so much to want her dead,but I am sure,the person had his reasons'' Nevia blinked back the tears in her eyes,if Millicence could touch his life as a business partner,why on earth did she abandon her family,who threatened Millicence to do such,who wanted her dead and who would do anything to keep her quiet, these questions went through her mind through out the day....

****
SISTERS HAVEN
I do not understand Carrie,who ordered the death of Millicence,she never got to sign the contract before she was died,I want to know who ordered it,she was meant to die after the contract has been signed,has Natalie recovered from the injury yet,once she does,I want a complete report of who did it,if she has nothing,she dies,is that understood'' Myla Carthong hung up the call and dropped the phone with a loud bang,she was head of the Haven where the most important women belonged,Millicence was a deal they could not bear to lose and now they did,the company would go to Millicence's next of kin and that would be a great lose for the Haven,Myla was prepared to use all she had to fight for the company irrespective of who and what will go for it...

121.content:
As the head of the Sisterhood, Myla had her work cut out for her,she dictated the lifestyle of everyone around her, she was also the mother of two beautiful daughters in midschool and the CEO of a consulting firm,Myla was everything of an accomplished woman and had always had all she wanted but that changed since the death of Millicence.
Myla walked into her office complex in Area 2, ignoring the noise of the cars and trucks from the street below,she delved her hands into her bag searching for her mobile phone, the phone immediately vibrated as she grabbed it and pressed the receive button and held the phone to her ears,it was her husband,Justice Carthong,
'Myla, did you withdraw two thousand dollars from our account this morning,I told you I don't want you touching anything that belongs to me from now on pending the time the divorce is complete,'
Myla sucked in air to calm her growing temper,responding softly,she said,' Justice,I did no such thing,you may have ordered the withdrawal last night when you were out with that tiny weasel of a girl you call your secretary who is only interested in milking you out but you are just too blind to see beyond her body.'
'At least,she has what it takes to be called a woman,she is caring,submissive and generously endowed in all you lack and. I did not withdraw any such amount last night neither was I with her, where do you get your reports from' Mr Carthong ended the call suddenly.

The Brothers came together in unison,each carrying the rod of power in his hands,the rod gleamed under the sun,the gold on its handle reflecting the rays so brightly,each brother had black iris,so dark that one could be hypnotised when staring into the eyes,the brothers parted and the Father came into the circle
''sons,we have won over the years and we would keep winning,the fate of the world resides in our hands,dominance is our name,and together we shall raise the name of the Brotherhood''
Devon,our prince,the next target is Millicence Andrews,she owns the Mill Printing Industry,she abandoned her three children to death while she got married to Al-han Andrews,all for the sake of money,run her over in all ways and finish her,you know what to do.......
